feed.title: Planise
feed.subtitle:
A QSReach Journal for the Subversion of Clustereotytping

"Welcome, comrades of cosmic whimsy! Step into the Quirky Cosmos Chronicle, a mystical corner of QSReach where rebellion reigns and conformity quivers. Here, amidst the vast unknown, we, the audacious trio of rogue thinkers—a sociologist by day, a chemist by night, and an artful cosmic weaver—extend a sly invitation. In this enigmatic abode, cryptic whispers intertwine with wry tales, as we defy convention and mock the unyielding status quo. Our cosmic voyage unearths the flavors of bygone civilizations, concocting rebellious recipes that defy gravity's limits. Our artistry paints celestial vistas, where ordinary perception surrenders to whimsical chaos.

Our sanctuary is not for the faint-hearted or the seekers of mundane refuge. No, it is a sanctuary for dreamers, rebels, and those who dare question reality's tapestry. Our mission: to shatter isolation's illusion, to ignite embers of multicultural unity, amidst the forgotten corners of the universe's cosmos. Secure your metaphysical seatbelts, fellow wanderers, and prepare for a delicate dance on the edge of cosmic discord. Amidst the chaos, we unveil fragments of truth, whispered in the shadows of distant stars. Together, we embrace the human spirit, defiant and resolute, as the universe tries to confine us.

Behold our cryptic chronicles, whimsical escapades, and musings of thought-provoking enigma. Welcome to the Quirky Cosmos Chronicle, where cryptic pages unravel the universe's hidden marvels."

Until the galaxies align,
Jo. Ir. Lu.

entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
entry.content:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

Jekyll requires blog post files to be named according to the following format:

YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MARKUP

Where YEAR is a four-digit number, MONTH and DAY are both two-digit numbers, and MARKUP is the file extension representing the format used in the file. After that, include the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.
